section.title: Starting &sr;
section.para: If installed from its rpm, &sr;'s installation can be tested by typing /usr/local/&sr;/bin/scirun.
If built from its source code tarballs, &sr;'s installation can be tested by changing the working directory (cding) to &sr;'s build directory and typing ./scirun.
After starting &sr;, its network editor window and shell prompt should appear.
If the window does not appear, note any displayed errors and see .
See &sr;'s tutorial for an introduction to the use of &sr;. The tutorial uses the previously downloaded sample data sets.
See the &sr; Users Guide for particulars on the use of &sr;.
